sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Row, Col, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Trash, PlusLg, XCircleFill } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Formik, FieldArray, Field } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; const schema = Yup.object().shape({ code: Yup.string().required('Product code is missing.'), title: Yup.string().required('Product title is missing.'), sku: Yup.array().of( Yup.object().shape({ itemName: Yup.string().required('Item name is missing.'), price: Yup.number() .min(0, 'Number must be 0 or positive.') .required('Price is missing'), inStock: Yup.number() .min(0, 'Number must be 0 or positive.') .required('Stock number is missing.'), discount: Yup.number() .min(0, 'Number must be 0 or positive.') .max(100, 'Number must below or at 100.') .required('Discount value is missing') }) ).min(1, 'At least 1 item is required.') }) const ProductForm = (props) => { return ( { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }} > { ({ values, errors, touched, handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur }) => (
Code {errors.code} Category Product Title {errors.title} Cover Image URL Product Description {`Remaining Characters: ${500 - values.description.length}`}
(

Items (Max 5 items)

{ values.sku.length > 0 && values.sku.map((item, index) => (
Item {index + 1}
Item Title { errors.sku && errors.sku[index] && errors.sku[index].itemName && touched.sku && touched.sku[index].itemName && ( {errors.sku[index].itemName} ) } Image URL Price { errors.sku && errors.sku[index] && errors.sku[index].price && touched.sku && touched.sku[index].price && ( {errors.sku[index].price} ) } Unit Discount% Off { errors.sku && errors.sku[index] && errors.sku[index].discount && touched.sku && touched.sku[index].discount && ( {errors.sku[index].discount} ) } In Stock { errors.sku && errors.sku[index] && errors.sku[index].inStock && touched.sku && touched.sku[index].inStock && ( {errors.sku[index].inStock} ) }
)) }
) } />
) } ) } export default ProductForm;
